captions.text: hello whatever city or town this is I like many of your local features
I like that baby and the various food products that the local white humans consume
look at me in my Gucci suit I relate to you and the poor people stuff that you have to go through
I know what it's like when times get bad and you have to borrow a yacht from your dad
my dog's on the roof he likes the fresh air could you please check and see if he's still up there
I don't flip flop it's just that I'm not alone can't seem to agree with my robot clone
Romney's we have problems too we're just like you except we're robots
we shoot lasers out of our eyes which we use to fry border jumpers and sometimes we fly
I'll lower taxes that's what the truth is but I didn't do this in Massachusetts
human emotions are silly and random we cannot feel them but we understand them
kids won't be maned, your wives won't be abducted as long as you do as you are instructed
gay marriage is wrong that's what I was taught but it's ok if you're gay robots
Romney's we have problems too we're just like you except we're metal don't listen to Bill Maher or Jay Stu
they're liberal Jews and they're not even robots
we support a girl's right to choose unless you choose to have an abortion
other than our wires and screws we're just like you and we malfunction from time to time
